amendment.description: To allow certain funds for shore protection to be prioritized for certain projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3870 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3870 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2409-2410; text: CR S2409) To allow certain funds for shore protection to be prioritized for certain projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3870 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3870 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 3801.
